Title: Philosopher's Stone
Text:
I must find my own Philsopher's Stone and then bring it to old man Wuji back at Sky Island Outpost HQ near 16, 85, 16.

He suggested it would take something from many different schools of magic.

Perhaps the experienced magicians and alchemist traders could be a good source of information and materials?

I wonder what he will give me if I complete this quest?!
CompleteText:
Finally, I've assembled all the necessary parts and proudly show Wuji!

Wuji's eyes glow as he tells me, "Not bad! I knew it was in you! Remember, if you build your own Philosopher Engines to convert mana between typesâ€”Redstone Flux power is what destroyed the world long ago! Have fun!"

After all that work, Wuji gave me nothing but a half empty book and a long silence! Well, I suppose I did have some fun along the way... Maybe that's all that matters!?  Follow your Bliss!
